LanguageData.WHE_CompoundBow.label: Compound Bow (Half-Elf)
LanguageData.WHE_CompoundBow.description: A large semi-mechanical bow made using half-elf technology and the principle of pulleys and levers. It has high rate of fire, flight distance, accuracy, and power, but is difficult to handle in close quarters combat.
LanguageData.WHE_ElvenCompoundBow.label: Elven Compound Bow (Half-Elf)
LanguageData.WHE_ElvenCompoundBow.description: A large semi-mechanical bow made by combining half-elf technology, ancient elf technology, and modern technology. Compared to compound bows, its rapid fire performance and flight distance are further enhanced, and its accuracy is also improved.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_CarbonArrow.label: carbon arrows
LanguageData.AS_WHE_ElvenPowerArrow.label: Elven Enhanced Arrow
